title: Scarce N321 SF Hess Sweeney to trade for E107 HOFer
author: fisherboy7

posts.post_title: Scarce N321 SF Hess Sweeney to trade for E107 HOFer
posts.post_content:
Hi Guys, this might be a longshot, but it's worth a try.

Willing to explore trades of one of my personal favorites that doesn't currently fit with my collecting goals. Offering up this beautiful N321 SF Hess card of Sweeney for trade. It is conservatively graded PSA 2 because of the slight tobacco stain on the bottom left corner. Otherwise a VG+ card all around. 

I'm only looking to trade this card for a E107 HOFer. Cash could be involved on either side if needed. Please let me know if you have something that might work. Thanks for your time, Ben. 

[IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/fisherboy7/thetop25/N321Sweeney.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://photos.imageevent.com/fisherboy7/tobaccocards/n321sweeney2.jpg[/IMG]
Nice card Ben.  For those that don't know this guy with only 6 posts - there will be no issues with any deals involving Ben.  He' a top notch person!  Many others here can also vouch for him.
Great card, Ben. Wish I had the E107 to trade.

Thank you Fred, and Adam, for your kind words. Nice to hear from my old collecting friends! I may have something cooking trade wise, but even if it doesn't work out I'll be happy to keep this one tucked away in the collection. :)

Yearly Bump :)

Still looking to trade for a E107 HOFer. Have some other bait too. Thanks!

Still looking. Trade bait can be seen here (willing to move any non-e107's in trade)

[url]http://imageevent.com/fisherboy7[/url]
